fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A description of Glasgow Necropolis in a travel feature (Halloween haunts, 31 October, page 52) mistakenly referred to a 1954 hunt by children for the Gorbals Vampire; that hunt took place at the city’s Southern Necropolis. • People from Leigh in Greater Manchester are Leythers, not “Leithers” as we said (True north, 14 November, page 12, Weekend). • Other recently amended articles include: The golden hour: 15 ways to change your life in a work-from-home lunch break Letting Covid-19 circulate in hope of herd immunity ‘could make it more lethal’ Unilever sets target of €1bn in annual sales of plant-based foods Is Boeing’s 737 Max now safe and when will it return to service?
